Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value. With its unique features and high-quality materials, it's truly a standout item. Given its craftsmanship and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I am offering it to you today for $150. This is an exclusive opportunity to own something special at a price that reflects its true worth. I trust you'll find it to be a valuable addition to your collection. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
